name: Lucille CHAPMAN v. WOONSOCKET HEALTH CENTER

parties: Lucille CHAPMAN v. WOONSOCKET HEALTH CENTER.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
BEVILACQUA, C.J., did not participate.

attorneys: George E. Furtado, Lovett, Morgera, Schefrin & Gallogly, Ltd., Providence, for plaintiff.
Harold E. Adams, Higgins, Cavanagh & Cooney, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
Lucille CHAPMAN v. WOONSOCKET HEALTH CENTER.
No. 85-270-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Aug. 2, 1985.
George E. Furtado, Lovett, Morgera, Schefrin & Gallogly, Ltd., Providence, for plaintiff.
Harold E. Adams, Higgins, Cavanagh & Cooney, Providence, for defendant.
